bibl.title: The Monetary Systems of the Greeks and Romans.
bibl.note: 13 contributions presented at a gathering organized by the Center for the Ancient Mediterranean at Columbia, April 2005. - Pp. 1-11 W.V.H., Introduction; - 323-330: Index.
HARRIS William V. (Ed.), The Monetary Systems of the Greeks and Romans.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2008, 8°, xiv-330 pp., tabl., diagrammes, figg. ISBN 978-0-19-923335-9. £58.
